content: This might be a dumb question since lean is intuitionistic, but is anyone aware of support for fuzzy sets?

How is Lean intuitionistic? :thinking:
This being said, there doesn't seem to be anything stopping us from formalizing fuzzy sets.
So there is currently no formalization of or a library providing a formation of fuzzy sets?
As far as I know, no. Lean has an intuitionistic logic but mathlib heavily uses its classical axioms, so this isn't the limiting point
Kwame Porter Robinson has marked this topic as resolved.
